(can-be-used-underwater [uwok], mindless-units-immune [mind])
 
(Requires Two Hands [twohanded], Armor Negating [armornegating], Soul Slaying [soulslaying], Magic Resistance Negates [mrnegates], No Effect on Mindless [mind], May Use Underwater [uwok], Piercing Damage [pierce], Magic weapon [magic], Strength not added to damage [nostr])

Requires 5S to forge (S1)

The hazy quarrels of this crossbow pierce all armor and slay the soul of anyone hit. This missile weapon can also be used underwater.
